data.message: Eminem 2017 YOU'RE A BITCH!!!! I'm not "whining" about his freestyle. Like I said in my last comment to your stupid ass you talk the talk. Let's see if you're bitch ass can walk the walk. You ain't shit Marshall. I'll call your stupid ass out any day. Let's see it bitch

replies.message: Ya he's the bitch and your here on his page hiding behind your talking all big but is just a triggered washed up trash.

I'm not hiding behind shit. I'm calling him out right here he should know how to message me if he really is that big and bad. I won't hide. I'm calling his bitch ass out seeing if he ain't just gunna be a bitch. Like I said he talks the talk let's see if he actually will read this and walk the walk. But he's just a pussy ass little bitch so I doubt it. He just hides behind the screen. Eminem. Let's see it pussy ass little bitch
